reviewText: Good speaker, kept my interest and perked my interest. Mark has a great deal of skills, talents and information. Good video.

I like the way he teaches, I have since purchased 2 more of his dvds.  Mark helps you understand the color wheel and how it works, plus so much more. If you want to learn how to mix color this is the dvd to purchase. I am so pleased I purchased  it, have already watch 3 times.
Great video. I recommend to amateur artists like me.
Very informative and excellent instructor! Mark takes a very complex subject and breaks it down into easy to understand segments. Highly recommend.
